professional.title: IoT Connected 3D Printer Control Solution
professional.description: Complete IoT solution to remotely control an SLA 3D printer with reverse engineering, MQTT protocol, and comprehensive sensor integration
professional.context: End-to-end solution for 3D prints custom-made hearing aids
achievements: Reverse engineered 3D printer protocols using Wireshark
Implemented MQTT protocol for remote control
Added sensors: humidity, temperature, limit switches, NFC readers

professional.title: Pix2Vox Machine Learning Model Training
professional.description: Training and optimizing a machine learning model to generate 3D voxels from 2D images using auto-encoder architecture
professional.context: 3D reconstruction for custom-made hearing aids manufacturing
achievements: Implemented data augmentation from STL files

professional.title: Next-Generation Jetting 3D Printer Development
professional.description: Complete development of innovative jetting 3D printer using 2D ink printhead technology for resin-based printing
professional.context: Revolutionary printing technology for high-precision 3D manufacturing
achievements: Created custom slicer for STL to G-Code conversion
Implemented resin supply and UV curing system

professional.title: Electroplating on 3D Printed Pieces
professional.description: Electrochemical process development for depositing copper and nickel on PLA 3D printed components
professional.context: Surface treatment enhancement for 3D printed hearing aid components
achievements: Successfully made PLA pieces conductive with carbon paint
Implemented copper and nickel electroplating process

professional.title: Electronic Circuit Creation with 3D SLA Printer
professional.description: Fast prototyping solution for electronic circuits using 3D SLA printer and chemical etching techniques
professional.context: Rapid prototyping support for jetting 3D printer project
achievements: Created precise masks with 3D SLA printer
Mastered chemical etching with iron chloride
Supported jetting printer development with custom PCBs

professional.title: ESP32 Acoustic Antenna System
professional.description: Advanced acoustic localization system using ESP32 and 4 microphones sampling at 100kHz for sound source positioning
professional.context: Semiconductor shortage solution - migration from STM to ESP32 microcontroller
achievements: Mastered DMA for high-frequency data processing

academic.title: Contactless Health Monitoring System
academic.description: Non-contact heartbeat and respiration monitoring system for retirement homes during sleep
academic.context: Healthcare IoT solution for elderly care facilities
achievements: Real-time data transmission to local server
MQTT protocol integration for reliable communication
Complete team project delivery on schedule

academic.title: Energy-Aware Connected Lamp
academic.description: Modular connected lamp responding to home energy consumption via French Linky smart meter integration
academic.context: Collaboration with art school students for aesthetic and functional design
academic.concept: Visual representation of energy consumption - higher consumption dims the lamp visibility
achievements: Successful Linky smart meter API integration
challenges: Legal entity requirement for Linky API access
Mechanical design for smooth lamp movement

academic.title: Educational Ransomware Development
academic.description: Ethical hacking exercise to understand ransomware mechanics and defense strategies
academic.ethicalNote: This was a controlled educational exercise in a sandboxed environment for learning cybersecurity defense mechanisms.

academic.title: IoT Connected Compost Bin
academic.description: Smart composting system with environmental monitoring and LoRa-WAN connectivity
academic.context: Sustainable technology and environmental monitoring solution
achievements: Raspberry Pi data collection node setup
networkArchitecture: LoRa sensor nodes in compost bins
Raspberry Pi gateway for data aggregation

personal.title: Telegram Cryptocurrency Bot (TON Network)
personal.description: Telegram bot for crypto trending on TON Network with hosting and real-time market notifications. Allowing the user to buy a trending place automaticaly from a second bot. All the paiment processus in cryptocurrency was automatic, even the refund system.
achievements: Integrated with multiple crypto data sources

personal.title: Advanced Web Scraping Suite
personal.description: Comprehensive web scraping framework using Beautiful Soup, Selenium, and Puppeteer for diverse data extraction needs

personal.title: Custom Locksmith Company Website
personal.description: Complete custom website development and hosting solution for a professional locksmith company
achievements: Full custom website design and development

personal.title: IoT Connected Smart Table
personal.description: Smart interactive table with WiFi-controlled LEDs, Spotify integration, and environmental monitoring display
achievements: Spotify API integration with physical buttons

personal.title: Instagram Profile Automation Bot
personal.description: Dual-approach Instagram automation system using browser automation and HTTP request manipulation. Automatique content creation and publication.

personal.title: Facebook Group Posting Automation
personal.description: Automated bot for scraping Facebook content and posting to specific groups with intelligent content distribution

personal.title: Personal Resume Website
personal.description: Professional personal resume website showcasing skills, projects, and experience with modern web design

personal.title: RepairShoes Service Shop Android App
personal.description: Android application for shoe repair service shop with semi-automatic customer messaging based on multiple service types

personal.title: Arduino Task Manager with 3D Printing
personal.description: First Arduino project combining task management system with 3D printing for domestic task organization

instructions.purpose: Ce fichier contient tous les projets actuellement présents sur le site CV
instructions.usage: Modifiez les données de chaque projet pour qu'elles correspondent à vos vrais projets
instructions.format: Conservez la même structure JSON mais changez les contenus (titre, description, technologies, achievements, etc.)
fields_to_verify: company - Nom exact de l'entreprise (pour les projets professionnels)
url - URLs réelles si elles existent
next_steps: 1. Modifiez chaque projet avec les vraies données
2. Supprimez les projets qui n'existent pas
3. Ajoutez de nouveaux projets si nécessaire
5. Informez-moi quand vous aurez terminé pour que je mette à jour le site
